scripts.text: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
scripts.title: Scarecrow Joke

scripts.text: I only know 25 letters of the alphabet. I don’t know y.
scripts.title: Alphabet Joke

scripts.text: How does a penguin build its house? Igloos it together!
scripts.title: Penguin Joke

scripts.text: Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts.
scripts.title: Skeleton Joke

scripts.text: What do you call fake spaghetti? An impasta!
scripts.title: Spaghetti Joke

scripts.text: I would tell you a construction joke, but I’m still working on it.
scripts.title: Construction Joke

scripts.text: Why did the bicycle fall over? It was two-tired.
scripts.title: Bicycle Joke

scripts.text: I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
scripts.title: Anti-Gravity Joke

scripts.text: Want to hear a joke about paper? Never mind, it's tearable.
scripts.title: Paper Joke

scripts.text: What’s orange and sounds like a parrot? A carrot.
scripts.title: Parrot Joke

scripts.text: What do you call a can opener that doesn't work? A can't opener.
scripts.title: Can Opener Joke

scripts.text: Why did the math book look sad? Because it had too many problems.
scripts.title: Math Book Joke

scripts.text: I'm on a seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.
scripts.title: Seafood Diet Joke

scripts.text: How does a lawyer say goodbye? I'll be suing ya!
scripts.title: Lawyer Goodbye Joke

scripts.text: What did one wall say to the other wall? I'll meet you at the corner.
scripts.title: Wall Joke

scripts.text: How do you organize a space party? You planet.
scripts.title: Space Party Joke

scripts.text: Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
scripts.title: Tomato Joke

scripts.text: Why did the coffee file a police report? It got mugged.
scripts.title: Coffee Joke

scripts.text: What did the grape do when it got stepped on? Nothing but let out a little wine.
scripts.title: Grape Joke
